summary: A mismatched team of British Special Services agents led by an American must infiltrate, in disguise, a female-run Enigma factory in Berlin and bring back the decoding device that will end the war.
cast: Matt LeBlanc|Eddie Izzard|James Cosmo|Nicolette Krebitz|David Birkin|Edward Fox|Udo Kier|Oliver Korittke|Karl Markovics|Sissi Perlinger|Holger Speckhahn|Pip Torrens|Maria Petz|Heinrich Herki|Paul Williamson|Susie Trayling|Cassandra Holliday|Gillian Hanna|Andreas Lust|Liliana Nelska|Aniko Guiz|Julian Rivett|Andreas Guenther|Oliver Huether|Wolfram Rupperti|Jeff Sturgeon|Gordon Catlin|Paul Kreshka|Patrick Berg|Sylvia Eisenberger|Jörg Stelling|Otto Beckmann|Erik Jan Rippmann|Oliver Hebeler|Otto Szanto|Helmut Hafner|Boris Pietsch|Sebastian Hölz|Silvia Steindl|Gábor Harsai|Christine Harbort|Gen Seto|Monika Orthofer|Michael Nix|Florian Danklmaier|Patrizio Buanne|Guy List|James Wakeford|Alexander Demblin|Hans-Christian Haas|Roland Schröck
keywords: behind enemy lines|punctuation in title|apostrophe in title|gay interest|spy
title: All the Queen's Men
